<edit_file>
<target_file>README.md</target_file>
<instructions>I am creating a simple README file for the OT Report Generator project.</instructions>
<code_edit># OT Report Generator

A simple web-based tool to generate overtime (OT) reports from CSV data.

## Description

This tool allows you to upload a CSV file containing overtime data and generate formatted reports for individual employees. It parses weekly sections in the CSV, calculates overtime hours, and displays them in a clean table format.

## Features

- Upload CSV files with overtime data
- Select employees from the uploaded data
- Generate detailed OT reports with dates, times, and hours
- Display total overtime minutes for the month

## Usage

1. Open `index.html` in a web browser
2. Click "Upload CSV File" and select your 'Làm thêm giờ.csv' file
3. Select an employee from the dropdown
4. Click "Generate Report" to view the OT details

## Requirements

- Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
- CSV file in the expected format (Vietnamese overtime data)

## Technologies

- HTML5
- Tailwind CSS
- PapaParse for CSV parsing
- Vanilla JavaScript

## License

This project is open source. Feel free to use and modify as needed.</code_edit>
</edit_file>
